member.name: T:NWebsec.Core.Fluent.IFluentInterface
member.summary: Interface that is used to build fluent interfaces and hides methods declared by from IntelliSense.
member.remarks:
Code that consumes implementations of this interface should expect one of two things:
When referencing the interface from within the same solution (project reference), you will still see the methods this interface is meant to hide.
When referencing the interface through the compiled output assembly (external reference), the standard Object methods will be hidden as intended.
See http://bit.ly/ifluentinterface for more information.

member.name: F:NWebsec.Core.HttpHeaders.XfoPolicy.Disabled
member.summary: Specifies that the X-Frame-Options header should not be set in the HTTP response.

member.name: F:NWebsec.Core.HttpHeaders.XfoPolicy.Deny
member.summary: Specifies that the X-Frame-Options header should be set in the HTTP response, instructing the browser to not display the page when it is loaded in an iframe.

member.name: F:NWebsec.Core.HttpHeaders.XfoPolicy.SameOrigin
member.summary: Specifies that the X-Frame-Options header should be set in the HTTP response, instructing the browser to display the page when it is loaded in an iframe - but only if the iframe is from the same origin as the page.

member.name: F:NWebsec.Core.HttpHeaders.XXssPolicy.Disabled
member.summary: Specifies that the X-Xss-Protection header should not be set in the HTTP response.

member.name: F:NWebsec.Core.HttpHeaders.XXssPolicy.FilterDisabled
member.summary: Specifies that the X-Xss-Protection header should be set in the HTTP response, explicitly disabling the IE XSS filter.

member.name: F:NWebsec.Core.HttpHeaders.XXssPolicy.FilterEnabled
member.summary: Specifies that the X-Xss-Protection header should be set in the HTTP response, explicitly enabling the IE XSS filter.
